      • getContractByUserId

        public UserContractsDto getContractByUserId​(Long id)

      • getContractByUserIdByDate

        public UserContractsDto getContractByUserIdByDate​(Long id,
                                                  int lookBackMonths)
        Checks if the user with the userId exists
        Parameters:
        id - the user id
        lookBackMonths - 0 means all
        Returns:
        all contracts as sender and all contracts as traveler for a given period (half-yearly, yearly, all)

      • confirmContract

        public Contract confirmContract​(User user,
                                Long productPostId,
                                Long travelerId)
        Checks if the sender is the logged user. Checks if the sender is not the traveler. Adds traveler to the contract and sets the delivery status as INITIATED and sets the time.
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        productPostId - the corresponding product post id
        travelerId - the traveler Id
        Returns:
        created contract

      • updateContractStatus

        public Contract updateContractStatus​(User user,
                                     Long contractId,
                                     String newStatus)
        Checks if the contract exists with the contract id. Checks if a traveler exists for the contract to be updated. Checks if contract end date has not passed current date. For status to be PICKED_UP, Checks if the user is either the sender or the traveler. For status to be IN_TRANSIT, Checks if the user is the traveler. For status to be DELIVERED, Checks if the user is the sender.
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        contractId - the contract id
        newStatus - the new status
        Returns:
        updated contract

      • getReviewCompletion

        public Boolean getReviewCompletion​(User user,
                                   Long contractId)
        Checks if the current user already completed review for this contract
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        contractId - the contract id
        Returns:
        the review done status

      • updateCost

        public Contract updateCost​(User user,
                           Long contractId,
                           Double cost)
        Checks if the current user already completed review for this contract
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        contractId - the contract id
        cost - the cost
        Returns:
        the contract
